description:
High performance bibs for epic trail sessions. With a premium chamois, these bib liners are ready to test the metal. Combining two types of material, these stretch and breathe for all-day delight in the saddle.Low profile bib design prevents slippage and layers comfortably under your riding kit.Construction combines stretch nylon panels with highly breathable mesh panels.HeiQ Fresh provides long-lasting odour control.Soft silicon leg grip keeps everything in place.Engineered 3-D Italian chamois.

        Sustainability














                      Recycled content






FairTrade











                      Certified Fair Trade
name: Patagonia Dirt Roamer Liner Bibs - Men's
